text: Click is a 2006 American fantasy comedy movie directed by Frank Coraci and starring Adam Sandler, Kate Beckinsale, Christopher Walken, David Hasselhoff, Henry Winkler, Julie Kavner, Sean Astin. It was distributed by Columbia Pictures and was nominated for an Academy Award in 2007. Kate. Remember June 28, 2006.
